name: Comedge
description:
Comedge is a red cube inside a labyrinth, to be controlled by you.

As soon as you hit Play, you are sent into a maze where you have to find the blue capsule as many times as possible within one minute. Every time you touch the capsule, it will teleport to a random position.

Note: If you bump against a wall, your position will change. There is nothing to prevent this from happening, since this game will never receive any future updates. So if you flip over, deal with it. Also, if you fall from the platform, you will respawn back in the place you started.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move.
